differences.explanation: Complete RGB color change affects every pixel of the text
differences.pixelImpact: High - Every letter pixel changes color

differences.explanation: Text baseline shift affects font anti-aliasing on every character edge
differences.visibility: SUBTLE - Hard to notice without side-by-side comparison
differences.pixelImpact: Medium - Anti-aliasing creates different pixel patterns

differences.explanation: Missing shadows affect pixels around card edges and create different layering
differences.visibility: MODERATE - Noticeable if you look for depth
differences.pixelImpact: Medium - Shadow pixels around entire card perimeter

differences.explanation: Different corner rounding creates completely different edge pixels
differences.pixelImpact: High - Corner pixels completely different shape

differences.explanation: Button repositioning affects button pixels and background pixels behind it
differences.pixelImpact: High - Both button and background pixels change

differences.explanation: Smaller font creates different character shapes and spacing
differences.pixelImpact: Medium - Character rendering affects multiple pixels per letter

differences.explanation: Larger font creates different character shapes and spacing
differences.pixelImpact: Medium - Character rendering affects multiple pixels per letter

differences.explanation: Lower opacity creates much lighter text, affecting all text pixels
differences.pixelImpact: High - Every text pixel becomes much lighter

differences.explanation: Slight background color change affects large area of pixels
differences.pixelImpact: Very High - Entire section background affected

differences.explanation: Button overlap creates pixel conflicts with form field above
differences.visibility: OBVIOUS - Button clearly overlapping input field
differences.pixelImpact: High - Overlapping elements create visual conflicts
